home.subtitle: An indie studio rooted in Cardano
home.description: We believe blockchain can be the business chassis for indie developers and one-person companies—a permissionless global payment platform, permanently verifiable data storage, and digital real estate that generates continuous cash flow.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.paragraph1: The rise of AI will propel humanity as a whole to new heights in intelligence and productivity, but it won't take responsibility for every individual. Those who can't keep up with AI's pace will be left far behind. Faced with this unprecedented force of change, human nature and social inertia make a smooth transition unlikely—more likely, we'll be plunged into an era of chaos.
philosophy.paragraph2: Rather than placing all our hopes on governments and corporations, we prefer to keep our opportunities in our own hands.
philosophy.paragraph3: That's why we choose to build our own territory in the digital world. Starting with blockchain.

paoPool.title: Pao Pool
paoPool.description: Our Cardano stake pool, running stably for over a year. When you delegate ADA to us, your assets never leave your wallet and there's no lock-up period. It's a win-win crowdfunding—you haven't handed over your money, yet you've supported our development work.

governance.title: Governance
governance.description: We actively participate in Cardano on-chain governance, contributing our voice to decentralized decision-making.

products.title: Products
products.description: We're building VODA (Voice of ADA), a Cardano community information aggregation platform.

support.title: Stake to Pao Pool
support.description: Your delegation is the most direct way to support us. Funds stay in your wallet, no lock-up period, withdraw anytime.

hero.title: Pao Pool
hero.description: "Pao" means "bubble" in Chinese. We are an independent family development team dedicated to bringing novel and interesting applications to the Cardano ecosystem. Pao Pool is our transparent and reliable Cardano stake pool, running stably for over a year. Every delegation is direct support for our development work.
hero.tagline: Stake your ADA, build with us.

starknet.title: Bubble Validator️
starknet.description: Bubble Validator is our validator node deployed on the Starknet network. Our team currently focuses on building in the Cardano ecosystem, but we continue to follow Starknet's development. If you hold STRK tokens, we invite you to stake with us to support our future development work.

cardano.title: How to Stake to PAO Pool?

step1.title: Go to Staking Page
step1.description: Click the "Stake" button to go to the staking page.

step2.title: Connect Wallet
step2.description: Click the Connect Wallet button to connect your Cardano wallet.

step3.title: Confirm Delegation
step3.description: Click "Delegate" and confirm the transaction to start earning ADA rewards!

starknet.title: How to Stake to Our Starknet Validator?

step1.title: Visit Staking Page
step1.description: Click the "Stake" button to go to the operation page.

step2.title: Connect Wallet
step2.description: In the top right corner, click "Connect Wallet" and authorize.

step3.title: Select Stake
step3.description: After wallet connection, find and click the "Stake" button below "Connect Wallet".

step4.title: Confirm Transaction
step4.description: Enter the amount you want to stake and the reward receiving address, click "Delegate" and confirm the transaction to start earning rewards.

starknet.note: For detailed tutorial, please refer to Starknet Official Guide.

acknowledgement.title: Acknowledgement
acknowledgement.message: Heartfelt thanks to every delegator for your trust and support!

governance.about_content: Cardano governance is a decentralized decision-making system that allows ADA holders to participate in the network's future development.

products.title: Our Products
products.description: Explore innovative products Bubble Studio brings to the Cardano ecosystem.

voda.name: VODA
voda.description: Cardano community information aggregation platform, hear the voice of ADA.

seo.defaultTitle: Bubble Studio - An Indie Studio Rooted in Cardano
seo.defaultDescription: Bubble Studio is an independent development team rooted in the Cardano ecosystem. We provide Pao Pool staking services and are committed to bringing innovative products to the Cardano ecosystem.

home.title: Bubble Studio - An Indie Studio Rooted in Cardano
home.description: We believe blockchain can be the business chassis for indie developers and one-person companies. A permissionless global payment platform, permanently verifiable data storage, and digital real estate that generates continuous cash flow.

products.title: Our Products - Bubble Studio
products.description: Explore innovative products Bubble Studio brings to the Cardano ecosystem, including VODA (Voice of ADA) and other governance participation platforms.

staking.title: Staking - Bubble Studio
staking.description: Stake your ADA to Pao Pool and support our development work. We provide transparent and reliable Cardano stake pool services, running stably for over a year.

about.title: About Us - Bubble Studio
about.description: Learn about the Bubble Studio team, a small family workshop rooted in Cardano.

governance.title: Governance - Bubble Studio
governance.description: Learn about Cardano governance actions and hot topics, participate in decentralized decision-making, and let every ADA holder have their voice heard.

blogs.title: Blog - Bubble Studio
blogs.description: Read the latest articles from Bubble Studio, learn about our development progress in the Cardano ecosystem, product updates, and community news.
